name: Smooth Wheel
description:
Automatic Steering Control
Super Realistic Wheel Suspension
Smooth High Quality Truck and Cargo’s
Fun and easy to drive.

The Realistic Truck and Tractor Simulation game, delivery the package without drop it.
Awesome road and new obstacle are constantly getting add in each levels
to enjoy the perfect driving.
FEATURES:
▶ TOP NOTCH PHYSICS:
▶ GORGEOUS HIGH RESOLUTION VISUALS.
▶ 70 Different Interesting levels
▶ 14 AWESOME Cargo’s.
▶ 8 - Premium vehicles
▶ Drive Tractors, Jeep 4x4, Truck Trailers

Are you ready for a Unique and realistic physics experience?
